ramel.config.title: Ramel Config
ramel.config.tooltip.rammingDamage: The amount of damage dealt to entities rammed, in half-hearts.
ramel.config.tooltip.additionalRammingRa: The amount of extra range beyond the camel's normal hitbox that the ramming effect will apply.
ramel.config.tooltip.knockbackMultiplier: The knockback multiplier applied to entities rammed.
